name: Dungeon Rollers (itch)
description:
Hello! My name is Massimo Albano. I am a 20-year-old University student from Ontario, Canada, currently pursuing an honours degree in Computer Science. This is my first attempt at a game and I hope you enjoy it! I've learned a lot throughout my development, and I am very excited to continue on to other projects in the future! I am a big fan of rogue-like games and so I wanted to try my hand at making a simple game with similar aspects

Feedback is greatly appreciated, I have a lot to learn! Also, I would love to see some of your high scores in the comments below!
